summary: Simple mod that removes blood stains from the screen when taking damage.
descriptionHtml:
Simple mod that removes blood stains from the screen when taking damage.
Extract into your Skyrim folder, run SkyrimLauncher.exe, press \"Data Files\" and check \"Load Loose Files\".

Dont forget to press \"endorse me\" button, thanks!

[center][url=http://www.skyrimgems.com][img]http://i.imgur.com/YDB0J.gif[/img][/url][/center]
author: Kligan
